availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer. North Carolina native. Married to Pernecia Bates Pool Wood in Christian County, Kentucky, on June 28, 1840. Father of William Wood, James C. Wood, Mary Susan F. Wood, Nancy Ellen Wood, Sarah Clay Wood, Bettie Wood, and Joseph Ann Wood. Farmer in Christian County in 1850. Farmer in Caldwell County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Christian County, District 1, p. 469A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Princeton, p. 64-5.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Christian County Marriages, Film #001942963, p. 169.
Find A Grave, "Alexandra Wood (1814-1886)," Memorial #153034701, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/153034701 (accessed April 5, 2021).
